argument.description: The target columns or expressions that are compared. The return type is the same as the type of the first expression. The default column name of the NULLIF result is the column name of the first expression.

description: The NULLIF expression compares two arguments and returns null if the arguments are equal.
sample:
select nullif(listid,salesid), salesid
from sales where salesid<10 order by 1, 2 desc;
